attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think it time to do somethink about the young teens in the uk i am a mother of four young children and think somethink needs  to be done now before it is to late.The police need to walk the streets at night any young children found youths after 7pm should be taken home if not supervised by an adult first time this happens the parents should be let off but the next time the kids are found out at night the parents should be fined if they refuse to pay the fines there child benifit should be stoped. kids have no guidence now and need it to know what is right and wrong there needs to be community centers set up with sports activitys to keep kids out of crime there is nothing for young kids to be on the street for but to breack windows smash other peoples property be under age drinkers and end up doing drugs something needs to be done now before the futer genaration of people are all alcholics drugs users pushers and theifs  with habbits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
